thread.title: Atlantans offer opinions on Alabama (the state and the football team)
thread.title_full: Atlantans offer opinions on Alabama (the state and the football team)

author: Michelle Matthews | mmatthews@al.com
title: Atlantans offer opinions on Alabama (the state and the football team)
text:
Comments 
Oh, Atlanta. We know you'll be putting on the Dawg this Saturday, even as Alabama comes into the game against Georgia as, well, the underdog. 
In light of the big SEC game tomorrow, AJC.com took a camera out on the streets (and, apparently, into one of their big, noisy malls) to ask citizens their opinions of Alabama. And they're not all bad. Several people say they have relatives in Alabama, or they've been to the beach in Alabama, and they like the state. Others see us as uneducated rubes. 
The Facebook comments are more brutal. The only good thing about Alabama is it keeps Mississippi from slamming into Georgia. Alabama...gateway to Mississippi! What is a pretty woman in Alabama called? A tourist 
Kinda makes a tide want to roll, doesn't it? 
Click below to watch the video:
